metadata.synopsis: A waveservant that guards Offering's chest
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_Agoto -258.624; 5.502; -233.5422. Talk to the guard waveservant

0.speaker: Seawind Star Stolitti
0.context: NodeContext: Mild threat/annoyance; wants the player to behave and leave them alone

1.speaker: Seawind Star Stolitti
1.text: The Wavemother sees all - even you.
1.context: NodeContext: Mild threat; wants to make sure the player behaves
